comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

> @deltaxsingh Hello there. Unfortunately, I am unable to reproduce the ad. Could you please go to the AdGuard filter log (4th tab --> resent activity) and clear the filter log (three dots in the top right corner --> clear)? Here you go! It's ONLY in the Copilot app on Android. The website is clean!

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.3.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gamerch.com/phasmophobiajp/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value)

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. If AdGuard is enabled, the left and right margins are completely eliminated. Also, the icon in the upper left corner of the screen is displayed in the wrong position.
(AdGuardが有効になっていると、ページ左右の余白が完全に無くなります。また、左上のアイコンの表示位置がずれます。)

2. Screenshots

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![Screenshot 2024-06-26 at 14-19-14 トップページ](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/114981625/77e7fef3-23b4-4e66-9e1b-7b8cb2d5abe9)
(AdGuard Disabled)

</details>


### Privacy

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

`||gateway.bingviz.microsoftapp.net^`

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180744) if other issue.

issue.title: timesofindia.indiatimes.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180744) if other issue.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

issue.title: thehulltruth.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

There are several large and empty divs that just say "Advertisement"

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/46940694/69ed42ff-4e67-4287-97a6-3d462236d15a)


### Proposed solution

Here is a filter using [uBlock's procedural cosmetic filters](https://github.com/gorhill/uBlock/wiki/Procedural-cosmetic-filters) which blocks all the advertisements:
```
www.thehulltruth.com##div:matches-attr(class="/ad-placeholder-.*/")
```

The reason a regex was chosen here is that there are several differently named classes which the ads use.

If you wish to use a static filter, here is a list of css classes from ones I encountered, as well as which ones css classes exist for, however there may be additional ones:
```
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-1
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-2
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-5
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-6
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-7
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-9
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-10
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-11
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-13
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-33
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-34
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-35
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-36
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-37
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-38
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-39
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-40
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-43
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-44
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-45
www.thehulltruth.com##.ad-placeholder-49
```
and yes, `ad-placeholder-8`, `ad-placeholder-12`, `ad-placeholder-14` to `ad-placeholder-32`, `ad-placeholder-41`, `ad-placeholder-42`, and `ad-placeholder-46` to `ad-placeholder-48` are missing. I do not know why, however they don't appear in their source. who knows. 

### Additional information

_No response_

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://www.ddd-smart.net/doujinshi3/show-m.php?g=20240622&dir=001&page=0](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ddd-smart.net%2Fdoujinshi3%2Fshow-m.php%3Fg%3D20240622%26dir%3D001%26page%3D0) ### Comment > ``` > iframe width="100%" height="480px" style="display:block" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" frameborder="no" src="https://go.mnaspm.com/smartpop/f402dc9b294ed0bd29ea316ef7e55644b2bc762306e9ec44b49769afc9989ecc?userId=e1322a4eeb71935a2597e00a5295aca956617a6d6ef754f065c74f6195c0cde1" > ``` > > > ``` > iframe width="100%" height="480px" style="display:block" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" frameborder="no" src="https://creative.rmhfrtnd.com/widgets/v4/Universal?campaignId=sidebar&sourceId=ddd-smart.net&creativeId=W100xH480&tag=girls%2Fjapanese&autoplay=all&thumbsMargin=3&gridRows=3&gridColumns=1&responsive=0&hideButton=1&hideTitle=1&userId=b7acd0ae31f67644091f506f0f030c2b5b6cef16028b282f2bfbb1944f5da534&autoplayForce=1&quality=240p" > ``` > > > ``` > > div class="site-group" > ``` > > This issue is caused by Adguard on iPhone's inability to handle iframes properly. There is no specific rule in place to hide the ad placeholder. On PC, blocking the script reduces the size to 0, effectively hiding the ad frame. However, on iPhone, the iframe remains visible, which is why it's expected that the ad frame does not disappear. If there are any other reasons contributing to this behavior, please let me know for future reference. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4bjdqttcuxess8kgcowc4k8c00gwg0sf9ass8y38xw.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/bn4jtra0f6ok0ook80kwkc0wwoow8os1bv96pvu9cp.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/oasxq2s796ow00css0wks8oo4408wg43e2qyleibo4.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.3 DNS filtering: | server: `System`

comment.body:
@AdamWr In the middle of learning, the adblockers pop up will still appear

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/37255346/efe03de0-fe11-4037-83ac-d9c2d7dcd803)

This is a rule taken from the blocks ads feature of Adguard ```adblock-filter-list duolingo.com###root > div.kPqwA._2kkzG:first-child > div._3yE3H > div._2G9ED._29gfw > div._1QQpk.RMEuZ._1GVfY:first-child > div._2lGLD.Jhr-N > div._2tNGm.ZTjh6:last-child ``` or this (the adblock pop up is gone, but the remaining elements will still be there) ```adblock-filter-list duolingo.com###root > div.kPqwA._2kkzG:first-child > div._3yE3H > div._2G9ED._29gfw > div._1QQpk.RMEuZ._1GVfY:first-child > div._2lGLD.Jhr-N > div._2tNGm.ZTjh6:last-child > div._1tzFd ``` maybe you can convert to another rule? I am sure that this rule alone will not be effective enough to eliminate it completely

### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://www.ddd-smart.net/doujinshi3/show-m.php?g=20240622&dir=001&page=0](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ddd-smart.net%2Fdoujinshi3%2Fshow-m.php%3Fg%3D20240622%26dir%3D001%26page%3D0) ### Comment > ``` > iframe width="100%" height="480px" style="display:block" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" frameborder="no" src="https://go.mnaspm.com/smartpop/f402dc9b294ed0bd29ea316ef7e55644b2bc762306e9ec44b49769afc9989ecc?userId=e1322a4eeb71935a2597e00a5295aca956617a6d6ef754f065c74f6195c0cde1" > ``` > > > ``` > iframe width="100%" height="480px" style="display:block" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" frameborder="no" src="https://creative.rmhfrtnd.com/widgets/v4/Universal?campaignId=sidebar&sourceId=ddd-smart.net&creativeId=W100xH480&tag=girls%2Fjapanese&autoplay=all&thumbsMargin=3&gridRows=3&gridColumns=1&responsive=0&hideButton=1&hideTitle=1&userId=b7acd0ae31f67644091f506f0f030c2b5b6cef16028b282f2bfbb1944f5da534&autoplayForce=1&quality=240p" > ``` > > > ``` > > div class="site-group" > ``` > > This issue is caused by Adguard on iPhone's inability to handle iframes properly. There is no specific rule in place to hide the ad placeholder. On PC, blocking the script reduces the size to 0, effectively hiding the ad frame. However, on iPhone, the iframe remains visible, which is why it's expected that the ad frame does not disappear. If there are any other reasons contributing to this behavior, please let me know for future reference. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4bjdqttcuxess8kgcowc4k8c00gwg0sf9ass8y38xw.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/bn4jtra0f6ok0ook80kwkc0wwoow8os1bv96pvu9cp.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/oasxq2s796ow00css0wks8oo4408wg43e2qyleibo4.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.3 DNS filtering: | server: `System`

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.duolingo.com/shop](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.duolingo.com%2Fshop) ### Comment > Duolingo shows popups all over the site that tell me to turn off the adblocker. comment.body:
I did a lesson when I was checking it today earlier and the next one a moment ago, and I don't see a popup like that.
No idea about a rule until I will be able to reproduce it.

comment.body:
Здравствуйте. К сожалению, не могу воспроизвести рекламу в поиске. Она блокируется правилами из базового фильтра. Пожалуйста, попробуйте включить-выключить блокировщики контента в настройках Safari и перезапустить Safari, а также проверить обновление фильтров.
Не закрывайте окно AdGuard 30-60 секунд.

There is no specific rule in place to hide the ad placeholder. On PC, blocking the script reduces the size to 0, effectively hiding the ad frame. However, on iPhone, the iframe remains visible, which is why it's expected that the ad frame does not disappear. If there are any other reasons contributing to this behavior, please let me know for future reference. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4bjdqttcuxess8kgcowc4k8c00gwg0sf9ass8y38xw.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/bn4jtra0f6ok0ook80kwkc0wwoow8os1bv96pvu9cp.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/oasxq2s796ow00css0wks8oo4408wg43e2qyleibo4.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.3 DNS filtering: | server: `System`

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
